projects.name: Forsaken Fortress - the survival RPG
projects.blurb: A special RPG in which you assemble your team, build and manage your base, collect resources, and survive in a post-apocalyptic world

projects.name: FPS Russia: The Game
projects.blurb: Use FPS Russia's arsenal of explosives to shoot, run, and shoot more in his first video game.

projects.name: Coming Out On Top - A Gay Dating Sim Video Game
projects.blurb: A video game where you play a gay college guy who just came out of the closet. A dating sim with suspense, humor, & erotic situations.

projects.name: The Infection Simulation
projects.blurb: An intense multi-player first-person survival simulator.  Survive in randomly generated cities slowly being overrun by zombies.

projects.name: Dragon Drop
projects.blurb: Dragon Drop is a platforming adventure game for the mobile market that features the ability to drag and drop in platforms and objects.

projects.name: Pathfinder Online: A Fantasy Sandbox MMO
projects.blurb: A game where your actions are persistent, your characters can build kingdoms, and YOU are the storyteller!

projects.name: Barkley 2 - an RPG Sequel to Barkley Shut Up and Jam: Gaiden
projects.blurb: Not for TREND.  Not for CORPORATE ATTITUDE.  Not for STONER.  Only true DOOM-MURDER HEADS.

projects.name: Meriwether: An American Epic
projects.blurb: Take command of the Corps of Discovery in this RPG based on the historic Lewis and Clark Expedition for PC, Mac, and Linux.

projects.name: SlipSpace
projects.blurb: SlipSpace is a multiplayer, 3D space-shooter with elements of a 3rd person action RPG for iOS, Android, Mac, PC, Linux and OUYA

projects.name: War for the Overworld
projects.blurb: A mix of real time strategy and god game. Influenced by Dungeon Keeper, Overlord, StarCraft and Evil Genius.

projects.name: Data Hacker Initiation - A feature rich RPG for Windows/Wine
projects.blurb: The start of an ambitious multi-faceted project from UK-based developer Gamers Immersive. Create your own rewards package!

projects.name: Mupen64Plus OUYA (Nintendo 64 Emulator)
projects.blurb: Port of the popular open-source Nintendo 64 emulator "Mupen64Plus" to the OUYA video game console.

projects.name: Girl Genius and the Rats of Mechanicsburg
projects.blurb: An iOS and Android game of physics and action in the steampunk world of Girl Genius®!

projects.name: Antharion - An Old-School RPG
projects.blurb: An old-school turn-based party-based RPG set in an open fantasy world. For PC, Mac and iPad.

projects.name: Anima - Gate of Memories
projects.blurb: Anima Gate of Memories is an action RPG set in the Anima Beyond Fantasy world featuring a deep compelling story and exciting game play

projects.name: The Adventures of Rubberkid
projects.blurb: Teach kids the evils of bullying with this FREE Flash (and PC!) game by bouncing insults back at the bullies who hurl them.

projects.name: Bronto Blast : Dino Tootin', Asteroid Apocalypse Platformer
projects.blurb: Bronto, avid astronomer-astronaut apatosaurus, must save all the dino eggs of the world before the  incoming ASTEROID hits his planet!

projects.name: Tornado Maker: Real Science, Real Learning
projects.blurb: We're creating the next generation of super-scientists with a game-based app series, starting with Tornado Maker and Tornado Master.

projects.name: Galcon 2: Galactic Conquest
projects.blurb: The official sequel to multiplayer real-time strategy (RTS) game Galcon. Launch swarms of ships at enemy planets to conquer the galaxy!

projects.name: Ancient Axes: Heroes on Paper - OUYA Launch Title
projects.blurb: Control two heroes at once for mind-bending single player or play with friends for action-packed, classic Gauntlet-style multiplayer.
